pilots.name: Asajj Ventress
pilots.caption: Force of Her Own
pilots.ability: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose 1 enemy ship in your (mobile firing arc) at range 0-2 and spend 1 (force). If you do, that ship gains 1 stress token unless it removes 1 green token.

pilots.name: Ketsu Onyo
pilots.caption: Black Sun Contractor
pilots.ability: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose 1 ship in both your [Front] and [Turret] at range 0-1. If you do, that ship gains 1 tractor token.

pilots.name: Sabine Wren
pilots.caption: Artistic Saboteur
pilots.ability: While you defend, if the attacked is in your [Mobile arc] at range 0-2, you may add 1 [Focus] result to your dice results.

pilots.name: Shadowport Hunter
pilots.text: Crime syndicates augment the lethal skills of their loyal contractors with the best technology available, like the fast and formidable Lancer-class pursuit craft
